root.name: 2 Fast 4 Gnomz
root.description: Overview2 Fast 4 Gnomz is an auto-running game developed and published by QubicGames for the WiiWare and 3DSWare platforms.GameplayIn 2 Fast 4 Gnomz the player controls 1 of 4 different gnomes which continuously runs from the left side the screen to the right. The player has control over the jumping and special moves of the gnomes.
